name: sfcc-devtools
description: Support Browser Interaction with VS Code, Eclipse, and SFCC Business Manager via DevTools Web Inspector.
author: Red van Workshop

scripts.pack:
npm run -s test && npm run -s pack:webkit && npm run -s pack:firefox && echo '
★ ALL DONE
'
scripts.pack:webkit: crx pack src -o dist/sfcc-devtools-webkit.crx -p key.pem && cd src && jszip -c ../.jszip-webkit.json &> /dev/null && echo '✓ WebKit Extension Created'
scripts.pack:firefox: cd src && jszip -c ../.jszip-firefox.json &> /dev/null && echo '✓ Firefox Addon Created'
